channel.title: Need help on bluur client
channel.description:
Hello moparscaper's
First of all pl0x do not flame idk its client problem or source but i posted it here.
When i have climbed stairs i see only black sky.I want to see the ground how do i do it? Example. Im in lumbrigde castle.I climb the stairs.Im in the second floor everything is good, but i see black sky around i can use objects.Everything is normal just the black sky. I want to see ground like grass and what is outside.
I hope you understand.
Thanks for help mehh.
